schema.name: ethers_sendTransaction
schema.description:
Send a transaction and return the transaction response.
The transaction response is the transaction hash.
It requires the ethereum address of the recipient and the amount of ether to send.
It doesn't support ENS name or alias name.

to.description:
The ethereum address to send the transaction to, Ex: 0x1f9090aaE28b8a3dCeaDf281B0F12828e676c326,
It must be ethereum address, ens or alias name aren't supported.
Use ens-getOwner to get the ethereum address of an ENS name or use addres.
Use addressBook-getAddress to get an ethereum address for the given alias name.

value.description: The amount of ether to send, Ex: 0.5
